nodes.text: The Baragwin droid shield was a highly efficient version of the basic droid energy shield. This Baragwin version had been heavily modified and customized to be able to run off the power supply of the droid. The energy drain on the droid was insignificant and the protection gained was equal to a normal, light droid energy shield.
A droid must be at upgrade class 1 to be able to equip this item.
